content: Braille Page? Blogging By: Rand Fishkin December 2, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin December 2, 2005 Braille Page? Blogging The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Kat was doing some competitive link analysis and came across a page that surprised her. It appeared that the information at the top of the page was shown in a strange, braille format below.... But, as it turns out, it's just some poor soul's crappy hidden text repository. Note that the "braille" only shows up in Firefox (sorry IE users). Just a fun anecdote to close out the week. Enjoy the weekend folks. Copied! Back to Top
